data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Metropolitan Manila, Philippines that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Metropolitan Manila, Philippines
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Metropolitan Manila you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Metropolitan Manila, Philippines.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Metropolitan Manila to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Jesus, I pray that all the Kalagan people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Kalagan people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Kalagan people is yours.
Spirit, help every believer in Metropolitan Manila, Philippines be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Metropolitan Manila, Philippines a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Metropolitan Manila. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.
